name: Hand-Thrown Ceramic Mug
description: Each mug is hand-thrown on a potter's wheel and finished with a reactive glaze that makes every piece unique. Holds 12 oz comfortably. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

name: Washed Linen Table Runner

name: Cedar & Smoke Soy Candle

name: Herringbone Wool Throw
description: A luxuriously soft merino wool throw in a classic herringbone weave. Perfect draped over a couch or at the foot of the bed. 50" x 70".

name: Olive Wood Serving Board
description: Sustainably harvested olive wood, shaped and sanded by hand. Each board has its own unique grain pattern. Treat with mineral oil to maintain. Approx 16" x 8".

name: Stoneware Bowl Set
description: Set of three nesting bowls in speckled stoneware. Reactive glazes in cream, sage, and charcoal. Oven, microwave, and dishwasher safe.

name: Organic Cotton Napkin Set
description: Set of four napkins in heavyweight organic cotton. Pre-washed for softness. Available in natural, clay, and slate. 18" x 18" each.

name: Brass Taper Candle Holder
description: Solid brass candle holder with a weighted base and a gorgeous patina that deepens over time. Fits standard taper candles. 4" tall.

name: Minimal Bud Vase
description: A simple, elegant bud vase in matte white stoneware. Perfect for a single stem or small arrangement. 6" tall.

name: Concrete Incense Holder

name: Forged Carbon Steel Chef Knife
